kv3.3:5.3: Rāgasahagataṃ rāgasahajātaṃ rāgasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ rāgasampayuttaṃ rāgasahabhu rāgānuparivatti akusalaṃ lokiyaṃ sāsavaṃ saṃyojaniyaṃ ganthaniyaṃ oghaniyaṃ yoganiyaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ upādāniyaṃ saṃkilesiyaṃ cittaṃ vimuccatīti?
kv3.3:6.1: Saphassaṃ cittaṃ vimuccati, phasso ca cittañca ubho vimuccantīti?
kv3.3:6.3: Sarāgaṃ cittaṃ vimuccati, rāgo ca cittañca ubho vimuccantīti?
kv3.3:7.7: sapaññaṃ cittaṃ vimuccati, paññā ca cittañca ubho vimuccantīti?

kv3.3:9.7: sapaññaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ vimuccati, paññā ca cittañca ubho vimuccantīti?

kv3.3:19.5: sapaññaṃ samohaṃ cittaṃ vimuccati, paññā ca cittañca ubho vimuccantīti?
kv3.3:20.3: Vītarāgaṃ vītadosaṃ vītamohaṃ nikkilesaṃ cittaṃ vimuccatīti?
